items.title: What game companies can learn from AI analysis of 1.5M gamer conversations | Creativ Company
items.description: Creativ Company is emerging today as a new kind of market intelligence company. It uses AI to do do sentiment analysis.

items.title: CockroachDB’s distributed vector indexing tackles the looming AI data explosion enterprises aren’t ready for
items.description: Scaling distributed SQL queries needs more performance and efficiency in the agentic AI era. It’s a challenge Cockroach is looking to solve.

items.title: Inside Intuit’s GenOS update: Why prompt optimization and intelligent data cognition are critical to enterprise agentic AI success
items.description: Intuit is using advanced genetic algorithms to help with prompt optimizations that could have significant impact for users.

items.title: Car and chipmakers form group to develop open in-car connectivity
items.description: Automotive car makers, suppliers, semiconductor manufacturers and ecosystem partners announced the formation of the OpenGMSL Association.

items.title: Enterprise alert: PostgreSQL just became the database you can’t ignore for AI applications
items.description: Analysts provide insight on what the latest acquisition of a PostgreSQL database vendor means for enterprise data and AI.
